CSVopt_first_row_header_chk: First row of CSV/TXT file contains headers
CSVopt_grp_char_label: Optionally specify a grouping character [e.g. 1,000,000]. No need to type comma which is default:
OpnWrkSht_label: For a column name we support alphabets, numbers and underscores. All other unsupported characters will be replaced by an underscore. You can rename the column from the variable grid.
Save_prj_label: Save all analysis (in the 'NEW' or the named project)
Save_prj_label2: Before you open or switch to another project (or exit the application) save your current work to a named project if it is 'NEW' or update the existing named project with the changes
Save_prj_defaultDir_radio: Save the project in default project directory:
Save_prj_customDir_radio: Save the project in a specified location
Save_prj_customDir_label: Select a location where you want to save the project:
rerun_missingDSLbl: The following dataset(s) are not open in the Datagrid. Either open them and try again, or use 'File > ReRun Output' to run on different dataset name(s).
reproducibilityErrMsg: Reproducibility is not supported on output files created with old versions. Output files must be created with version 10.3.7 and above.
closeDSsaveWarn: This version of BlueSky Statistics does not track whether you have saved your changes. If you haven't saved your changes please do so, else they will be lost
